title: Theoretical WIMP-Nucleus Scattering Rates For Isomeric Nuclei
content:
The direct detection of dark matter constituents, in particular the weakly interacting
massive particles (WIMPs), is central to particle physics and cosmology. In this paper we develop the
formalism for WIMP-Nucleus induced transitions from isomeric nuclear states. We specialize it in
the case of the experimentally interesting target 180 Ta
